TopicTitle: Do I have to start a new career going from .25 to .90?

Articles.Content: I loaded the save from .25 over to .90 but I'm not getting any of the new contracts. I started a new game and the new contracts were there after I launched. Couldn't find a thread on this.

Yes, you will most likely need to start a new career. Theoretically you could do a line-by-line comparison on the old and new saves, and manually edit in the values required to properly activate all aspects of the new Career mode, but that's a lot of work and it's unlikely you'll do it all right the first time (so back up the old save before messing with it, eh?) -- possible, but difficult.
